item.title: Wall Street breaks from net-zero climate alliance ahead of Trump term
item.description: Six of the worlds largest banks all withdrew from a net-zero banking alliance just weeks apart ahead of President-elect Donald Trump's term.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Red state sues insurer for using customer data to build ‘world’s largest driving behavior database'
item.description: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton is suing Allstate insurance company for allegedly illegally collecting, using and selling the driving behavior data ...

item.title: Major blue city mayor silent after illegal immigrant uses shelter for criminal activity

item.title: Trump ally Steve Bannon pledges to 'take... down' Elon Musk

item.title: Trudeau says 51st state is distraction from Trump tariff threat, acknowledges facing 'successful negotiator'
item.description: Outgoing PM Justin Trudeau says Canada becoming the 51st state is "not going to happen," though President-elect Trump is a "successful negotiator."
